name: Dogwood Glade
description:
Find your way in the woods.

Use arrow keys or WASD to move.

Use E to pick up and place torches anywhere.

Made from scratch using Lua and LÖVE2d, over one week for LÖVE Jam 2022.

Utilizes some of tween.lua for its easing functions, part of Breezefield for collision, and Fipps for the font.
